titleStmt.title: An epistle to friends briefly commemorating the gracious dealings of the Lord with them, and warning them to beware of the spirit of contention and division which hath appeared of late in George Keith and some few others that join with him, who have made a breach and separation from Friends in some parts of America / by Thomas Ellwood.
titleStmt.author: Ellwood, Thomas, 1639-1713.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reels 1205:16 and 1228:17.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
